Subject: Re: [rest-discuss] The Ambiguous Semantics of PUT: Complete or Incomplete

John Panzer wrote:

> You'd PUT the whole representation, replacing the entire entry.  This 
> always works.  It also works for removing the summary.


I agree. However some people here do not agree with this, and have 
maintained that the server is free to do anything it likes, including 
retaining the old categories, adding any new ones, and still returning a 
200.

At this point, I simply hope that no one is unwise enough to implement 
that behavior, even if the spec allows it (or, more properly, does not 
explicitly forbid it).

--
